product_name: Leki Spark S Downhill Ski Poles
long_description: Meeting the demands of aggressive, expert-level skiers, the Leki Spark S downhill ski poles feature lightweight aluminum shafts and detachable straps that quickly disconnect in the event of a fall. Straps feature small tearproof loops that click easily in and out of the grips for convenience-great for quick transitions between lodge and lift. Straps make the poles into extensions of your arms-once clicked in, your hands are firmly supported by the anatomic shape. Spring-loaded release system provides consistent, reliable release to protect your arms and shoulders during falls. The Leki Spark S downhill ski poles feature standard baskets that work well in packed snow. 14mm aluminum upper shafts.
short_description: Meeting the demands of aggressive, expert-level skiers, the Leki Spark S downhill ski poles feature lightweight aluminum shafts and detachable straps that quickly disconnect in the event of a fall.
